Description:
Job Description
Designing Alteryx workflows
Installation, configuration, and upgrade of the Alteryx platform.
Performance monitoring and optimization of the Alteryx platform.
Troubleshooting and issue resolution related to Alteryx platform.
Regular backup and recovery planning and execution.
Alteryx upgrade when a new version is released.
Collaboration with the IT team to ensure integration and compatibility with other systems.
Documentation of system configurations, processes, and procedures.Job Details
